de.metalcon.utils

Class FormItemList

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.metalcon.utils.FormItemList

  • public class FormItemList
extends java.lang.Object
    list for multi-part server form posts wrapping fields and files
    Author:
    sebschlicht

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FormItemList()
      create an empty multi-part form wrapper

        extract the form item list from a multi-part form
        Parameters:
        request - Tomcat servlet request
        factory - disk file item factory
        Returns:
